Apr 2
Here's 4 genius ideas to say ‘thanks’ at the office
Organise events? Let the audience sign a Thank You for the guest speaker
Speakers drop wisdom, we nod like we’re taking it in - then what? Stick a QR code on the screen and let the whole audience scan, add a message to the card and say thanks instantly.
Impress a rockstar client
Skip the boring email and send a client thank-you card instead. Get the team to add their messages and a pic, then bam - you’ve instantly upped your relationship game (and maybe locked in that renewal).
Give a Thank You card from the leadership team
Want to look like a company that actually values its people? Get the big bosses to sign a thank-you card for a top-performing team, a standout employee, or everyone who survived budget season. You can send a link to the card to the whole team.
Shout out your office MVPs
You know those people who fix the WiFi, organise the coffee or save your PowerPoint disasters? Make their day with a team signed card. The look on their face...priceless!
